summary: Buyable, crftable, upgradable, enchantable,  and, ooh, it glows!
descriptionHtml:
A deerskull battlestaff - be the life of your party! You can craft this magnificent weapon, you can upgrade it, or you can buy it from Lucan in Riverwood!
I made this from a request, and I must say, I am extremely satisfied with the results. This Â is probably one of my favorite weapons that I've made so far.
You [b]can[/b]:
-Craft it
-Upgrade it
-Buy it from Lucan in Riverwood
-Sell it to Ulfberth (or anyone else)
-Give it to a follower
-Drop it
-Pick it up
-Hit people with it
-Hit deer with it
-Hit guards with it (not recommended)
-Hit your followers with it (fun, but not recommended)
-Smash undead with it
-Kill Forsworn with it (recommended)

You can [b]not[/b]:
-Un-craft it
-Sell it to wolves
-Shoot fireballs from it
-Put it up Lydia's butt (I don't know why you'd do that).

It has similar stats to Wuuthrad. It also has unique textures, and IT GLOWS!

Please endorse if you like it!
author: Jane Harris
